item.description:
If anyone is running or wants to you should attend this clinic. I have been starting back running and want to make sure I do it right and don't injure my aging body. Please sign up here but contact Adam (see below) to get in on the program. BTW - if you need good running shoes they will video your stride and pick the best shoes for you. See their website and watch the video.

On Thursday May 2, 6:15pm at the Bayside Runner Plymouth location at 38 Long Pond Rd. in Plymouth, our Newton Running expert is coming to do a natural running and gait clinic in Plymouth. In this session you will learn all about proper running form for injury prevention and have an expert from Newton Running analyze your form and give you tips on how to improve. Please RSVP for this event
http://baysiderunnernewton.eventbrite.com/

Adam W. Stuhlfaut
Co-Owner - Bayside Runner
Email: adam@baysiderunner.com
www.baysiderunner.com

Bayside Runner - Plymouth Store & Main Office
38 Long Pond Road
Plymouth, MA 02360
PH: 508-591-8422

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Running Clinic @ Bayside Runner in Plymouth
